what: Fish Passage Data Wrangling and Reporting Functions
title: Fish Passage Data Wrangling and Reporting Functions
text: much … Package used clean data, QA, building interactive reports usually related fish passage planning, implementation monitoring.  Currently active development. want disect function understand things like folder structure repo used build actual report. Use risk consider keeping track version package using date formatted tags.  Install pak::pkg_install("NewGraphEnvironment/fpr")  looking backwards comparability used package past issues now newer release package, install : pak::pkg_install("NewGraphEnvironment/fpr@v1.1.0") (tag coinciding one used report)  reporting package serves help line generated bookdown Rmarkdown many dependencies knitr KableExtra. Additionally, key importance workflows rely provincial British Columbia data input spreadsheets version updates. 2022-04-13 provincial templates included: Populated British Columbia standardized Fish Data Submission Spreadsheet Template Populated British Columbia standardized Provincial Stream Crossing Inventory System submission template  Additionally many outputs manipulated functions rely tables generated postgresql database built bcfishpass. tables unstable column names likely change future.  Custom inputs include: priority level proceeding design replacement length survey upstream downstream conservative estimate linear length mainstem habitat potentially available upstream crossing fish species confirmed present upstream crossing following assessments. Photos within structured folders naming conventions per Provincial Stream Crossing Information System project specific protocols example
